Smart Mirror: Develop a smart mirror that can detect and recognize faces, allowing users to take selfies and share them directly to social media platforms. This can be achieved through the integration of a built-in camera, facial recognition software, and wireless connectivity. Confidence Score: 0.8

Holographic Display: Create a camera that can capture and display 3D holographic images, allowing users to view and interact with virtual objects in their environment. This can be achieved through the use of advanced optical technology and computational algorithms. Confidence Score: 0.9

Virtual Try-On: Develop a camera that can virtually try on clothes and accessories, allowing users to see how they would look in different outfits without having to physically try them on. This can be achieved through the use of AI-powered image processing and computer vision technology. Confidence Score: 0.8

Augmented Reality Printer: Create a camera that can print and display augmented reality images and videos, allowing users to view and interact with virtual objects in their environment. This can be achieved through the use of advanced printing technology and AR software. Confidence Score: 0.9

Interactive Portraiture: Develop a camera that can capture and display interactive portraits, allowing users to interact with the subject of the portrait through gestures and voice commands. This can be achieved through the use of advanced computer vision and machine learning technology. Confidence Score: 0.9
